title: Everyday Lace: Simple, Sophisticated Knitted Garments
description: F&W Media-Interweave Everyday Lace. Find simple garments and accessories for everyday life in this collection of eighteen projects using lace motifs for edging is only the beginning. Hidden among the collection of lovely garments is a thorough introduction to the basics of lace knitting including various cast-ons and bind-offs appropriate for lace knitting. Heather Zoppetti. Softcover 144 pages. Published 2014. ISBN 978-1-62033-134-7. Imported.
author: Heather Zoppetti
